name: Buckingham & District Angling Association
details: Local fishing group founded in 1910 that fishes on the Great Ouse and Woodfields lake.

name: Milton Keynes Anglian Association
details: Group fishing along the Great Ouse, Grand Union Canal and lakes in MK.

name: Bedford Angling Club
details: Group fishing at Bromham, Oakley, Biddenham and Fen Lake in Bedford.

name: Brampton Anglian Society
details: Group fishing at Hinchingbrooke Country Park, Sewells Lake, Alconbury Brook and Bromholme brook.

name: Offord & Buckden Angling Society
details: Group fishing along seven kilometres of the Great Ouse.

name: Ely Beet Sports & Social Club
details: Group with two sites for fishing - see their facebook group for details.

name: Tingewick (Verulum Angling Club)
details: Large fishing group with many sites including one on the Great Ouse at the back of the Tingewick Industrial Park

name: Waterbeach Anglian Club
details: Group with access to four lakes.

name: Cambridge Fish Preservation and Angling Society
details: Formerly known as the Jolly Anglers, this group fishes along over 30 miles of river bank, five lakes, four pits and one pond.
